text: 5.20 Ais 9.6, Mat 25.46, Jon 17.3, 1 Ti 3.16, Hib 1.8 Pen chɨn nopun, God Ñɨne apɨl, chɨnop gos tep ñek, God ne bɨ yɨpɨd gɨl mɨdeb ak nop nɨgtep gɨpun. Chɨn God bɨ yɨpɨd gɨl mɨdeb ak ayɨp jɨmñɨl yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, Ñɨne Jisas Klays ayɨp abe jɨmñɨl mɨdobun. Jisas Klays nɨm, ne God bɨ yɨpɨd gɨl mɨdeb. Ne chɨnop gek, pel pelnep yonɨgabun.
